title: Resume Job Recommender
description: A sophisticated recommendation system that parses resumes and matches them with relevant job openings using NLP and Vector Search.

title: MediaSage
description: An intelligent media management application with content analysis and smart tagging capabilities.

title: USB Access Control
description: A system-level security tool written in C# to monitor and control USB device access, preventing unauthorized data transfer.

title: Fish Disease AI
description: Deep Learning model (ResNet50) providing early detection of freshwater fish diseases to aid aquaculture.

title: Phishing Detection
description: Machine Learning pipeline to identify malicious URLs with high accuracy using lexical feature analysis.
